page.title: 07Mike Mills( continued )
page.content: He then chops logs for the fires in the house.The centre is open from February to October.He nearly always has a group in the centre.He also does some fell walking.Lost people often come to the centre asking for directions,and using his payphone.He and his wife also do some shopping,every now and then.He has to keep the schoolroom clean,and show groups around and collect eggs.He gets about 10 a day off the hens and 2 off the ducks.Towards the end of the day,he turns the generator on.That is the end of Mick Mills day.
